attributes.action: Stop cars parking on the pavements
attributes.additional_details: Pavements are for people, roads are for cars!
attributes.background: I am a Childminder and walk to school twice a day with several children. There are so many roads where are cars are parked half on the pavement this means that I have to push my buggies on the road as I am unable to fit on the pavement. This is dangerous and unnecessary if people park correctly!
